name: grave (itch) (zzox)
description:
contains blood

Controls:

WASD/Arrows: Move

C/J: Roll

X/K: Attack, Special Attack (Hold)

Z/L: Target, Release Target (Hold)

Made with Haxeflixel, Aseprite, Ldtk and Ableton Live.

Particle font from somepx and Englishtowne font from Dieter Steffmann.

Tips:

  • Targeting on an enemy will help direct your attacks.
  • You cannot be hurt while rolling.
  • Special attack (hold) does double damage.
